data.prayer: There are 337,200 people living in the state of Bitlis. Only about 127 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bitlis, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Bitlis, Turkey that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Bitlis, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Bitlis, Turkey a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Gajal, Gadzhal people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Gajal, Gadzhal people know you.
Lord, please give the 127 believers in the state of Bitlis the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Over 99.4 percent of the people of Bitlis are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, make bold the prophets in Bitlis, Turkey so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

location.name: Bitlis
location.people_groups_list: Kurd, Kurmanji, Chechen, Jew, Spanish, Alawite, Adyghe
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kurd, Kurmanji (2,200), Chechen (112,000), Jew, Spanish (16,000), Alawite (554,000), Adyghe (350,000)
